results.task_name: Create a project from natural language
results.prompt_sent: Create a new project called "Mobile App Redesign". Set its status to active and add a description: "Complete redesign of the mobile application with new UX patterns." Also add the tags: mobile, redesign, ux.

arguments.name: Mobile App Redesign
arguments.description: Complete redesign of the mobile application with new UX patterns.

results.task_name: Create a workunit with full details
results.prompt_sent: I need to track some work on fixing our login page. Create a workunit named "Fix Login Page Bug" in project 0ee0b4d7e9df4ca58f514f2b98d26238. The problem is that users can't log in when they have special characters in their password. We'll know it's done when all character types are supported and there are regression tests. Make it high priority.

arguments.name: Fix Login Page Bug
arguments.problem_statement: Users can't log in when they have special characters in their password.
arguments.success_criteria: All character types are supported and there are regression tests.

results.task_name: Add three tasks to a workunit
results.prompt_sent:
Add these three tasks to workunit c4a94074b51a4076989cdba9e9b8c984:
1. "Reproduce the bug locally" - high priority
2. "Identify root cause" - high priority  
3. "Write fix and add regression tests" - normal priority

All should start as todo.

arguments.title: Write fix and add regression tests

results.prompt_sent: Mark task a23624b4e186404cb25909740afe1ef8 as currently in progress.
Find the workunit called "Fix Login Page Bug" and get its full details including all tasks.

Save a context note on workunit c4a94074b51a4076989cdba9e9b8c984 recording this decision: we chose to fix the password validation on the backend rather than the frontend, because it's more secure. This is a high-importance architectural decision.

arguments.title: Password Validation Approach
arguments.content: We chose to fix the password validation on the backend rather than the frontend, because it's more secure.

results.prompt_sent: Create a new product asset called "Workunit Mobile SDK" in draft status. It's a software product currently in the development lifecycle stage. Add a description: "iOS and Android SDK for integrating Workunit into mobile applications."

arguments.name: Workunit Mobile SDK
arguments.description: iOS and Android SDK for integrating Workunit into mobile applications.

results.prompt_sent: Show me the details of project 0ee0b4d7e9df4ca58f514f2b98d26238, including how many workunits and assets it has.
Update workunit c4a94074b51a4076989cdba9e9b8c984: change its priority to urgent, and set its tags to: bug, authentication, critical.

Mark workunit c4a94074b51a4076989cdba9e9b8c984 as completed. Add completion notes explaining that the password validation was moved to the backend, all special characters now work, and 12 regression tests were added.

arguments.completion_notes: The password validation was moved to the backend, all special characters now work, and 12 regression tests were added.
